name: Ace Up One's Sleeve
description:
In this game, you play as a minggle against three other. For some reason, everybody is cheating at the table... And you need to follow up! If you don't, there's no chance to win :(

Try to achieve your victory over the others, by cheating as much as you can or by unqualifying your foes as you watch them cheating.

But be careful: no one likes a cheater, and you'll be expelled from the gaming table if they catch you!

Good "luck", and great game!
And that the best cheater win!

This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam 105

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Hope you like this very simple game! It's the second game I submited, and somethings are still messed up!

I intend to update this game... maybe, if you enjoy. Please, feel free to coment and give me some feedback! As everything was made by me this week (including art and music), some feedback on these would be great as well!!! :D

Thanks! Hope you have some fun!
